name: I’m going to die if I don’t eat sushi!
name_original: I’m going to die if I don’t eat sushi!
description:
"Hey, hey, hey, what the heck! The sushi is too good!"

If you don't keep eating sushi, you will die! This 3D action game takes the main character on a great adventure to fight the evil that is trying to erase sushi from the world!

Use your jumping action and love for sushi to conquer a total of 40 different 3D courses!

Game Features:
  • Collect "Sushi Souls" which you get by clearing stages!
  • Many scenario cutscenes. An epic battle between those who love sushi and those who hate sushi is depicted.
  • Several types of "jump skills" exist to enhance the main character's actions and increase the freedom of game attack.
